__e: Besides the religious leaders are against a republic and, frankly, they're right.
Even after the Republic, it's still my country.
The Republic is not what it once was.
That is until some suckhead writes home to mama and says he dipped his wick in the Republic of South Vietnam.
Sir, you just insulted the Republic of Miranda.
I don't give a damn about the Republic of Miranda.
"in the thanks of the republic they died to save."
To eat well, yes. To steal, yes. To murder, yes.
Counting on the Republic is a mistake.
